Room.Name: Green Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Green Room of Madame Ruthie's House of Pleasure.
Room.LongDescription: The Green Room is reserved for Madame Ruthie's oldest customer's and is quite rich in its furnishings. Silk pillows are stacked everywhere, and brocaded covers are on the bed. Soft lamp light flickers in the room, giving a pleasant glow to the beautiful materials. An open window looks over the bay, and birds twitter outside.
